name: Fu Forest Trail
description: Enjoy this 8.4-km out-and-back trail near Fuzhou, Fujian. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 2 h 24 min to complete. This is a popular trail for hiking and walking, but you can still enjoy some solitude during quieter times of day.
